devhubpool:org:create.description: create a scratch org from pooled devhub orgs

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

devhubpoolusernames.name: devhubpoolusernames
devhubpoolusernames.description: username or alias list for the pooled dev hub orgs

definitionfile.name: definitionfile
definitionfile.description: path to a scratch org definition file

durationdays.name: durationdays
durationdays.description: duration of the scratch org (in days) (default:7, min:1, max:30)

noancestors.name: noancestors
noancestors.description: do not include second-generation package ancestors in the scratch org

nonamespace.name: nonamespace
nonamespace.description: creates the scratch org with no namespace

setalias.name: setalias
setalias.description: set an alias for for the created scratch org

setdefaultusername.name: setdefaultusername
setdefaultusername.description: set the created org as the default username

wait.name: wait
wait.description: the streaming client socket timeout (in minutes) (default:6, min:2)

devhubpool:auth:jwt:grant.description: authorize pooled orgs using the JWT flow

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

instanceurl.name: instanceurl
instanceurl.description: the login URL of the instance the org lives on

jwtkeyfile.name: jwtkeyfile
jwtkeyfile.description: path to a file containing the private key

setaliases.name: setaliases
setaliases.description: set aliases for for the authenticated orgs
